summary: This document is a forwarded news article link from the New York Daily News about an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) who was mistakenly released following Jeffrey Epstein's suicide. It appears to be an internal FYSA (For Your Situational Awareness) communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references his suicide at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), which preceded the mistaken release of another inmate.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Suicide at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Mistaken Inmate Release at MCC
events.description: Following Jeffrey Epstein's suicide, another inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center was mistakenly released.

keyFacts: The document references Jeffrey Epstein's suicide while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
Following Epstein's death, another inmate at the MCC was mistakenly released.
The information is sourced from a New York Daily News article dated August 15, 2019.
The document appears to be an internal FYSA (For Your Situational Awareness) communication sharing this news.
